sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Endo International ( ENDP ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 12.8%.
Year to date, Endo International has lost about 62.7% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Salesforce.com ( CRM ), trading down 4.2%.
Salesforce.com is lower by about 8.9% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Flowserve ( FLS ), trading down 2.5%, and First Solar ( FSLR ), trading up 4.3% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
